verses.verse: Thanks to this, I, Paul, am the prisoner of the Anointed King Jesus on behalf of you, the non-Jews,
if you definitely heard about the management of the generosity of God, the generosity that was given to me for you,
that according to the thing uncovered to me He made the secret known to me, just as I wrote about previously in a little message,
to which you are able by reading to be aware of my understanding in the secret of the Anointed King,
that in different generations was not made known to the sons of the people, as it is now uncovered to His sacred missionaries and preachers in the Spirit,
for the non-Jews to be inheritors together, a body together, and joint possessors together of the promise in the Anointed King Jesus through the good news,
of which I became a servant in line with the free handout of the generosity of God, the free handout that was given to me in line with the influence of His ability.
To me (the smaller smallest one of all sacred people) this generosity was given to share with the non-Jews the good news of the untrackable wealth of the Anointed King
and to illuminate for everyone what is the sharing relationship of the secret, the one that has been hid away from the spans of time in God, the One who created everything
so that it might be made known now to the head rulers and the authorities in the heavenly regions through the assembly, the multifaceted insight of God,
in line with a purpose of the spans of time that He made in the Anointed King Jesus, our Master,
in whom we have the openness and the access in confidence through the trust of Him.
For this reason, I am asking you not to be getting discouraged in my hard times on your behalf, something that is your magnificence.
Thanks to this, I double over my knees to the Father of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King
(from whom every family tree in heaven and on earth is named),
so that He might give to you in line with the wealth of His magnificence in ability to gain power through His Spirit for the inner person,
for the Anointed King to reside in your hearts through the trust, having been rooted and having a foundation laid in love,
so that you might be strong enough to take down together with all the sacred people what is the width, length, depth, and height,
and to know the love of the Anointed King that is superior to the knowledge, so that you might be filled to all the fullness of God.
To the One who is able above everything to do even much more of things that we ask for or are aware of in line with the ability, the ability that is active in us,
to Him belongs the magnificence in the assembly in the Anointed King Jesus for all the generations of the span of time of the spans of time. Amen.
